Articles.Content:
What an awesome game! I've logged over 40 hours now (probably a lot more than that now), and I've gotten to the point where I can play competently at All-Star difficulty.

My car is the default model, but I have a white Tech paint job going. It's simple, but I love it.

What an awesome game! I've logged over 40 hours now (probably a lot more than that now), and I've gotten to the point where I can play competently at All-Star difficulty.

My car is the default model, but I have a white Tech paint job going. It's simple, but I love it.

I play as an octane or breakout, as the breakout has an awesome retro future design. But what I hate about it is the ugly rear, while the octane has a really good rear. I wish I could combine them...

I play as an octane or breakout, as the breakout has an awesome retro future design. But what I hate about it is the ugly rear, while the octane has a really good rear. I wish I could combine them...

Yeah, I really like Breakout too. A cool feature for Rocket League would be customization of smaller parts of the car, such as the rear as you mentioned.
